name: 3D Terraria Eye Of Cthulhu Boss Battle
name_original: 3D Terraria Eye Of Cthulhu Boss Battle
description:
Ever wanted to fight the Eye of Cthulhu but in 3D?! Here is your chance!

Fight the Eye of Cthulhu while dashing away to avoid custom attacks.

NOTE:
This is not completed nor is it guaranteed to ever be completed.
There are bugs and things are not finished. Multiplayer is half done, beware if you try to play through the network. 

Feel free to leave any suggestions, have fun!
